column2: Stocks, even those most vulnerable to a rising Covid surge, suddenly turned up on better news on the pandemic front. Now stocks seem positioned for a year-end rally, though inflation remains a concern.
column4: Omicron Is Surging. Inflation Is Rising. But Investors Are Dreaming of a Santa Claus Rally.

column2: Stocks are hitting records as the variant surges. Why investors have brushed off the new wave of Covid.
column4: Omicron Is Wreaking Havoc on the World. Investors Are the Only Ones Not Worried.
